annotatable.link_title: Hear Me Out by Lil Kee
annotatable.title: Hear Me Out

songs.lyrics:
12 ContributorsHear Me Out Lyrics[Intro]
But, I love you to death (Change on me)
(Oh, won't you change me)
And, I'm gone forever (Change me)
(Oh, won't you change me)
Can't depend on me, I ain't got nothin' but this Drac' (Just don't change on me)
Like I'm dyin' everyday
(Oh, won't you— Mmm)
You're all I got Lil Kee, jump out of here (Oh, won't you change me)
(Please, don't you change on me) Nah, for real
[Chorus]
If I gave you everything, would you take pain away?
Look me right up in my face, tell me, "It's gon' be okay"
Just don't let me starve again, you can come ride the wave
You can get your whole gang, tell 'em, "Come die today"
Stressed out dead broke, I hope I don't die this way
Bam died right 'round Christmas, fucked up my holiday
X pill, Percocet, do anything just to fly away (Fly away)
These niggas really groupies, do anything to get tied in
I gave you my love, you changed on me
So I fell in love with these .223s
Took so many drugs, I ain't got no sympathy
Won't open my arms, I know you steal from me
You the one that I want, your love is all I need
If I gave you my all, would you come die for me?
Girl, you can step on my heart, you better not lie to me
Girl, you can step on my heart, you better not lie to me

[Verse]
We put drums on everything, you can come join the band
We shot craps like everyday, workin' on my form again
Being bad, it made me
I won't let my soul forgive
Nigga keep thinkin' he made me
I'ma let his soul reveal
Too many shine, I'm glowing up
Pop it up, they know it's real (Let's go)
Why you disowning me?
Could've bought you golden grills
Trap house doing real numbers
More weight than a golds gym
Moms getting drunk, Pops going broke fuckin' with his nose again
Bro' goin' broke
He don't give a fuck, back kickin' doors again
Banging on your heart, bout damn time
You ain't never opened it
My faithfuls are
I was thinkin', "Damn, maybe you'd know who this is"
Mama, I pray you can find the Lord
So, you can have some love for real
Man we straight, help me find my way, you just keep loading steel
You just keep on loading steel lil' brother, I got you forever
Just get behind me, tell 'em "Nigga line it up, no cap"
You might also like[Chorus]
If I gave you everything, would you take pain away?
Look me right up in my face, tell me, "It's gon' be okay"
Just don't let me starve again, you can come ride the wave
You can get your whole gang, tell 'em, "Come die today"
Stressed out dead broke, I hope I don't die this way
Bam died right 'round Christmas, fucked up my holiday
X pill, Percocet, do anything just to fly away (Fly away)
These niggas really groupies, do anything to get tied in
I gave you my love (Yeah), you changed on me (Show)
So I fell in love with these .223s (With these .22— For real)
Took so many drugs, I ain't got no sympathy (This is fuck you)
Won't open my arms, I know you steal from me (Shit, nigga)
You the one that I want, your love is all I need (Nah, for real)
If I gave you my all, would you come die for me? (Would you?)
Girl, you can step on my heart, you better not lie to me (Don't ever lie to me, girl)
Girl, you can step on my heart, you better not lie to me (Please, don't lie)

[Outro]
Let's go lil' bitch
Yeah, yeah, yeah
Let's go, let's go
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Won't go no more
Yeah, yeah, yeah
Yeah, I told 'em 'fore
Let's goEmbed

songs.title: No Love
songs.embed_content: Read “No Love” by Lil Kee on Genius
songs.lyrics:
3 ContributorsNo Love Lyrics[Intro]
(Al Geno on the track)
(Damn, Kai, you goin' crazy)
I don't need nobody but your damn self
Can't trust nobody but your damn self
Everybody change [?]
They wasn't there when I ain't had shit but they love when I spend it

[Chorus]
They wasn't there when I ain't had shit but they love when I spend it
I don't know what's going on, ain't felt love in a minute
Tried to get on my knees and pray plus the drugs wasn't healing
I couldn't do nothing with your trust, that lil' love I was given
Even when them niggas changed, I be on the same thing
Ain't ever need no love, all the loyalty all gay
When I die, lil' bro, don't cry, just put my gun in my grave
[?] and I'm just watching time fade
[Verse 1]
Had to put a nine in my hand, dawg, where I go wrong?
Better hope the ones who'll take your life and you ain't the one close
Dirty shots up in my Amiri jeans, you should know
Them young niggas tote big guns, they won't go
Shoot you in your shit, won't make [?] I ain't got no [?]
I used to wake up same thing, nowhere to go
Now I wake up chain slang on the road
I done been through so much shit but love, how did you know?

[Chorus]
They wasn't there when I ain't had shit but they love when I spend it
I don't know what's going on, ain't felt love in a minute
Tried to get on my knees and pray plus the drugs wasn't healing
I couldn't do nothing with your trust, that lil' love I was given
Even when them niggas changed, I be on the same thing
Ain't ever need no love, all the loyalty all gay
When I die, lil' bro, don't cry, just put my gun in my grave
[?] and I'm just watching time fade

[Verse 2]
It don't mean shit when you gone, it all change
She fell out of love with the game and my thug ways
Got to the point where I say fuck my own mama in her face
I hope God does forgive me all the things that I say
You know I ain't mean it
After all that shit I did, lil' bro, I seen it
If I ever get caught outside without my blick I hope they sweet
If I catch that bitch outside, even with this blick, I'm still gon' squeeze it
You might say I'm tweaking
Maybe all these drugs and this liquor got me geeking
Maybe it's the Perkies and the Xanax that be speaking
It probably wasn't love that you showed, made me believe it
If I knew it was gon' end, I wouldn't show love in the beginning
You might also like[Chorus]
They wasn't there when I ain't had shit but they love when I spend it
I don't know what's going on, ain't felt love in a minute
Tried to get on my knees and pray plus the drugs wasn't healing
I couldn't do nothing with your trust, that lil' love I was given
Even when them niggas changed, I be on the same thing
Ain't ever need no love, all the loyalty all gay
When I die, lil' bro, don't cry, just put my gun in my grave
[?] and I'm just watching time fadeEmbed

songs.lyrics:
14 ContributorsLetter 2 My Brother Lyrics[Intro]
Turn Me Up Josh
J Thrash On The Track
Ayo, Bleu

[Chorus]
Damn, Lamar, how you just leave yo' lil' brother?
Main story, [?] tryna crash, I won't let 'em
We had got a youngin clipped, but, this shit still don't feel better
And I had cut off every nigga who had said they my killer (Nah, for real)
Sometimes, I cry a lot of tears, this shit don't feel right
You know I ain't gon' never be the same until you kill, right?
My life both fucked twin and you keep tellin' me to live life
You know I think 'bout all our memories
It gives me chills right
Balancin' our kids and our big sister cryin' every night
Talked to God, my gun down, I don't give a fuck
They wanna see her diе
What you know 'bout cryin' in front of you nigga?
It hurt so much, can't hold it in
And you feel like goin' up top
Just brought you closer to the еnd
This shit don't feel right
[Bridge]
I don't know what you seen in me
But, I'm havin' nightmares, I can't go to sleep
Told my mans, "Walk out the door"
Still tryna hold it in
Take care of your daughter
Everybody argue, you just stand on ten

[Verse 1]
He to a pic' with his new blick and think he in the field
I ain't got to prove myself to no nigga to show that I'm real
Everybody want to pick up a gun, but, won't nobody kill
I let niggas get too comfortable, now, they just wanna chill
Niggas say what they gon' do for you
He told me, "If I shoot, you shoot"
If you down [?], won't nobody come to your funeral
He tryna be hard, don't wanna listen
I can't get through to you
Give brodie the blicky, sit back and witness
I just throw the hoop
I put stars inside the roof so it'll never rain
I put diamonds on my dogs so they'll never change
I took racks up out the safe and took it to the bank
You lied to me, say you never leave
I wish you never came
You might also like[Chorus]
Damn, Lamar, how you just leave yo' lil' brother?
Main story, [?] tryna crash, I won't let 'em
We had got a youngin clipped, but, this shit still don't feel better
And I had cut off every nigga who had said they my killer (Nah, for real)
Sometimes, I cry a lot of tears, this shit don't feel right
You know I ain't gon' never be the same until you kill, right?
My life both fucked twin and you keep tellin' me to live life
You know I think 'bout all our memories
It gives me chills right
Balancin' our kids and our big sister cryin' every night
Talked to God, my gun down, I don't give a fuck
They wanna see her die
What you know 'bout cryin' in front of you nigga?
It hurt so much, can't hold it in
And you feel like goin' up top
Just brought you closer to the end
This shit don't feel right

[Verse 2]
Told my dog that he can't come 'round no more
He think I want him dead
Before you came, I loaded up all my clips and put one in the head
I can't have no niggas with me playin' killer, but really scared
I'm talkin' 'bout dice game, see [?] and big brother in the shed
Make him turn the lights off
'Fore she come down and give me head
I washed all the [?]
Dirty pistol and bloody hands
I done been on missions, kept cliquin'
And that bitch steady jammed
I done came through a couple times
You saw the car and ran
I just do what I can, life wasn't too fair
You in the hood all by yourself with nothin' to do there
I did shit for you that you won't ask to do for me
I been up for weeks, been chewin' Percs, but, I can barely sleep
[Bridge]
I don't wanna love no more
Wish I never hug no ho
Can't stop takin' drugs no more
Just promise me that you'll never go
And I'll be here for you 'til you get old

[Chorus]
Damn, Lamar, how you just leave yo' lil' brother?
Main story, [?] tryna crash, I won't let 'em
We had got a youngin clipped, but, this shit still don't feel better
And I had cut off every nigga who had said they my killer (Nah, for real)
Sometimes, I cry a lot of tears, this shit don't feel right
You know I ain't gon' never be the same until you kill, right?
My life both fucked twin and you keep tellin' me to live life
You know I think 'bout all our memories
It gives me chills right
Balancin' our kids and our big sister cryin' every night
Talked to God, my gun down, I don't give a fuck
They wanna see her die
What you know 'bout cryin' in front of you nigga?
It hurt so much, can't hold it in
And you feel like goin' up top
Just brought you closer to the end
This shit don't feel right2Embed
